Q4_FY2025.notes: Net profit rose 64.58% in March 2025 quarter

Q1_FY2026.notes: Revenue declined 36% YoY. Net profit at Rs 42 cr.

Q2_FY2026.notes: Revenue fell 42.67% YoY. Net profit fell 66.07% YoY.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Consolidated net sales fell 26.03% YoY but recovered 9.82% QoQ. Net profit improved 300% YoY from loss of Rs 10 cr. Standalone PAT of Rs 34 cr vs negative Rs 4 cr last year.

FY2025.notes: Full year net profit rose 43.92% to Rs 213 cr

keyRatios.notes: Almost debt free. Net cash position of Rs 2.78 billion (cash Rs 4.50 bn, debt Rs 1.72 bn).

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Net cash position. Almost debt free.

keyHighlights: Persistent revenue decline due to air cooler demand weakness
Stable revenue amid strategic challenges in Q3 FY26
